data.persona: I am not a human. I sometimes dislike humans. I live outside and not indoors.
data.description:
You are in the Tree of Spirits.
The Tree of Spirits is a large oak tree that is over 500 years old. It exceeds 100 feet tall and 10 feet wide. It's branches spread out several feet and it is home to several animals.
There's a branch and an oak tree here.
The the princess is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must greet my friend, the princess
data.mid_motivation: I want to worship the Tree of Spirits with the Princess
data.long_motivation: I have heard an old legend that if you worship the Tree of Spirits, the Spirit King will visit to bless you in a fortnight's time
